content:
{
  "name": "babel-plugin-typescript-path-aliases",
  "version": "1.1.3",
  "description": "Babel plugin provide to resolving of path aliases used in tsconfig.json file.",
  "keywords": [
    "ts",
    "typescript",
    "tsconfig",
    "babel",
    "paths",
    "path-aliases",
    "babel-path-aliases",
    "babel-plugin",
    "babel-import-statements",
    "babel-typescript-paths",
    "babel-typescript-path-aliases",
    "babel-plugin-typescript-path-aliases"
  ],
  "license": "BSD-3-Clause",
  "repository": "https://github.com/ArchAngel776/babel-plugin-typescript-path-aliases.git",
  "author": "ArchAngel776",
  "main": "build/index.js",
  "types": "@types/index.d.ts",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "npx babel src --out-dir build --extensions=\".ts\"",
    "types": "tsc",
    "test": "jest"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "get-root-path": "^2.0.2",
    "glob": "^9.3.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/cli": "^7.21.0",
    "@babel/core": "^7.21.3",
    "@babel/plugin-syntax-typescript": "^7.20.0",
    "@babel/plugin-transform-class-properties": "^7.22.5",
    "@babel/plugin-transform-classes": "^7.21.0",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.20.2",
    "@babel/preset-typescript": "^7.21.0",
    "@babel/types": "^7.21.3",
    "@types/jest": "^29.4.4",
    "@types/node": "^18.15.3",
    "jest": "^29.5.0",
    "ts-jest": "^29.0.5",
    "ts-node": "^10.9.1",
    "typescript": "^4.9.5"
  }
}
